name: Steve Scott's Portfolio
tagline: A collection of my recent work
body:
## Welcome to my portfolio.
The idea of this page is to eventually have a list of live links and images to some of my more recent work. For now, I'll just leave you with a list of links, until I get something proper added here.

### Current portfolio sites

* [www.sassquad.com](www.sassquad.com)
* [Current portfolio site] (www.sassquad.com/test) - this is a bit old, and as it's using a third party template, it was something I put together quickly as I was unhappy with modding my current site. It's been on the same basic template since 2007!

### Most recent work

* [Renew your UK passport](https://www.passport.service.gov.uk/renew/) - One of the cornerstone projects for The UK Home Office, the UK adult passport renewal service was launched as a public beta in June 2016, having been an invite only closed beta since the start of 2016. The service allows you to apply for a new passport online, featuring upload of photos from your camera or smartphone, which can then assess their suitability.
* [City AM profile portfolio](http://www.cityam.com/profile/stephen-scott) - I produced a variety of D3.js visualisations for the free newspaper's digital presence, culminating in the 2015 UK General Election results map. I produced a [Codepen](http://codepen.io/sassquad/pen/qZRaOd) of it for inspection.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
